sentences.english: Why does this video have more likes than dislikes? This is clickbait. ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么点赞的比讨厌多？这只是个钓鱼视频。

sentences.english: Still, there are someone stupid enough giving many likes to such kind of selfies.
sentences.chinese: 不过，还是有些不明就里的人会给这种自拍照点赞。
